inclusion.criterion: Painful Knee Osteoarthritis with presence of osteophytes on radiography
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: At least 1 of the following 3 criteria's: adult >50 years old, morning stiffness <30 minutes, or in the pre-stage surgical (programmed knee prosthesis replacement).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Acceptance to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients affiliated to a social security scheme (beneficiary entitled)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient under guardianship, or protection of justice.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient in the incapacity to answer the questionnaire
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
